model.saveGame
Class MovementsLog

java.lang.Object
  model.saveGame.MovementsLog

public class MovementsLog
extends java.lang.Object

This class is in charge of keeping a log of all the actions taken by the player as well as the time taken till the time it was saved and the password of the level so, when the file is read, the level can be identified

Constructor Summary
MovementsLog(java.lang.String password)
          Creates an instance of this class that will be in charge of keeping a log of all the movements done by the player
 
Method Summary
 void addMovementDOWN()
          Adds the movement "DOWN"
 void addMovementLEFT()
          Adds the movement "LEFT"
 void addMovementRIGHT()
          Adds the movement "RIGHT"
 void addMovementUP()
          Adds the movement "UP"
 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLog()
          Returns an array list containing in each position a string representing the action taken by the player.
 java.lang.String getPassword()
          Returns the password of the level that its saving
 long getTime()
          Returns the time that was saved in the log
 void setTime(long l)
          Sets the time that the player has been playing the level

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

getLog

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLog()
Returns an array list containing in each position a string representing the action taken by the player. These actions can only be "UP", "DOWN", "LEFT" or "RIGHT"

Returns:
ArrayList representing all the actions the player did during the playing of a level

setTime

Sets the time that the player has been playing the level

Parameters:
l - a long representing the time the player has been playing
